Name: KTV Bar
Review Text:
Great selection of songs to sing, cheap drinks and social distancing!

Downside is the moldy smell inside. Also it was a bit hot, I had to go to the street to breathe fresh air a bunch of times.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Extremely fun place to hang out while you're in Amsterdam, and the bartender was very nice üëç

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text:
Bit of a dingy place... Very dark and it gets very warm too.

I know one of the microphones was working, but the other didn't sound at all.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: This Karaoke bar is one of the best you could find in Amsterdam. The bartenders were amazing. As they were friendly and service-oriented. If there is any problem, they would solve it quickly. The environment is good. I had one of my best ‚Ä¶

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text:
Great place to drink, sing and make merry.
The staff is very polite and nice.
And the song library is rich with songs from pretty much every genre. ‚Ä¶

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Great place for karaoke. Go early or else you have to wait a long time before its your turn to sing. That's the only reason it got 3 stars. Fun place to go with a group. A few doors further you'll find karaoke bar "the End" which is also good.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Asian style karaoke, good fun. Japanese, Chinese and Thai songs represented. Drink prices are reasonable. Around midnight most of the local Asians end up here after work in one of the surrounding Asian restaurants.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Always have a fun time here, whether it's empty on a Monday night or a packed house on Friday. You get to hear a mix of Dutch, English, and Chinese songs which is pretty cool and of course somebody is going to sing "Angels"!

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Fun place to hang out with my friends. They have a karaoke bar and nice people work there. ‚Ä¶

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: It's an open room ktv bar, where you can sing in front of live audience in your seats. Bartender is friendly and can only recommend this place!

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: This is a Chinese karaoke bar with some Thai roots. No food here, besides the nuts served with your drink. They have a good selection of Chinese booze and also sell the Thai beer Singha. The karaoke is fun, but Asian orientated. And as in all.karaoke bars, don't expect any good singing.  :-)

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Great English, Mandarin and Cantonese song selections available! If you run into a great group hanging out, you'll have a great time with them too!

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Good place to go with friends. Always fun to sing while after a few drinks.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Cool place, great selection, cleaner than most seedy karaoke places I've seen around the world. Worth a visit !!

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Good prices, nice people, atmosphere. If you're in the Red Light District and wanna sing Rhianna or whatever then come here ü§§

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Great atmosphere and loads of fun.  If you love karaoke definitely check here out.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Very friendly staff and a place you should definitely visit if you come to Amsterdam.. good cocktails and a good spot to sing and hang out with family and friends.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Small but cozy kareoke bar. Come in as stranger, sing side by side as friend. Its loud, so only for singing, no talking... hahahah.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Trashy karaoke bar. Sound quality is terrible, so if you want some good karaoke you'd better search for a different place.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: I LOVED it! Can you please please please add the song; LOVE IS WICKED by BRICK AND LACE before this friday?? pleaaaaase? I love your bar!

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: International oriented Karaoke list. Great selection of cocktails and shooters to choose from.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Nice bar with decent prices for drinks. Very fun place to hangout!

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Always a fun time. Although you are going to have to respect the fact that some people can t sign :)

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Great night here, very good atmosphere

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text:
The owner is very kind and friendly.
The drinks are so cheap.
Mostly Asian residents visiting.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: racist, not even drunk and kicked out. Doesnt desrvre a crowd

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Nothing at all stands-out in this karaoke bar. Did not really like it.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Best. Karaoke bar. Ever. Best atmosphere. Best cocktails.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Best spot in town for karaoke and dice games.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Great atmosphere and super friendly, fun staff

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: Perfect place for everyone who loves music!üéºüéµ

Review Text: If you like karoke... one of the places to be...

Review Text: Great place and lovely friendly bar staff.

Review Text: Would be great of there are more mics.

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: What a laugh. Stayed till kick out time at 4am.

Review Text: (Translated by Google) My cousin visited me from South America, so I decided to take him to Amsterdam and after a long day of walking around the city we came across this bar and decided to get in for a quick drink. they were karaoke nights ‚Ä¶

Name: KTV Bar
Review Text: (Translated by Google) A place we found where there were people laughing and singing .. we drank wine - each glass for 5 euros. You choose music you want to sing and wait your turn ... Super fun ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) The coziest karaoke bar in Amsterdam! Always a nice atmosphere! The staff is friendly! I definitely come here more often! ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) The place for karaoke good drinks and a place to have a good laugh with a group of friends, you can also come here alone as there are enough people here! ‚Ä¶
